verses.text: And when the \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* of \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* of the \w fame|strong="H8088"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* concerning the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, she \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w prove|strong="H5254"\w* him with hard \w questions|strong="H2420"\w*.

And she \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* with a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H3515"\w* \w train|strong="H2428"\w*, with \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, and \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*: and when she was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, she \w communed|strong="H1696"\w* with him of all that was in her \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* her all her \w questions|strong="H1697"\w*: there was not \add any\add* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w hid|strong="H5956"\w* from the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, which he \w told|strong="H5046"\w* her not.\f + \fr 10.3 \ft questions: Heb. words\f*

And when the \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* of \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w* had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* all \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* that he had \w built|strong="H1129"\w*,

And the \w meat|strong="H3978"\w* of his \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, and the \w sitting|strong="H4186"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and the \w attendance|strong="H4612"\w* of his \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w*, and their \w apparel|strong="H4403"\w*, and his \w cupbearers|strong="H8248"\w*, and his \w ascent|strong="H5930"\w* by which he went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; there was no more \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* in her.\f + \fr 10.5 \ft attendance: Heb. standing\f*\f + \fr 10.5 \ft cupbearers: or, butlers\f*

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, It was a \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w report|strong="H1697"\w* that I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in mine own \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of thy \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* and of thy \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.\f + \fr 10.6 \ft report: Heb. word\f*\f + \fr 10.6 \ft acts: or, sayings\f*

Howbeit I \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* not the \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, until I \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \add it:\add* and, behold, the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* was not \w told|strong="H5046"\w* me: thy \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* and \w prosperity|strong="H2896"\w* \w exceedeth|strong="H3254"\w* the \w fame|strong="H8052"\w* which I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*.\f + \fr 10.7 \ft thy…: Heb. thou hast added wisdom and goodness to\f*

\w Happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add are\add* thy \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, \w happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add are\add* these thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, which \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, \add and\add* that \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* be the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which \w delighted|strong="H2654"\w* in thee, to \w set|strong="H5414"\w* thee on the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: because the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w loved|strong="H0160"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, therefore \w made|strong="H7760"\w* he thee \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* and \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*.

And she \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and of \w spices|strong="H1314"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* great \w store|strong="H7235"\w*, and \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*: there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* no more \w such|strong="H1931"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* of \w spices|strong="H1314"\w* as these which the \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* of \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* to \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.

And the \w navy|strong="H0590"\w* also of \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w*, that \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* from \w Ophir|strong="H0211"\w*, brought \w in|strong="H0935"\w* from \w Ophir|strong="H0211"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w plenty|strong="H7235"\w* of \w almug|strong="H0484"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*.\f + \fr 10.11 \ft almug…: also called, algum trees\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* of the \w almug|strong="H0484"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w pillars|strong="H4552"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and for the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w harps|strong="H3658"\w* also and \w psalteries|strong="H5035"\w* for \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*: there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* no such \w almug|strong="H0484"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, nor were \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 10.12 \ft pillars: or, rails: Heb. a prop\f*

And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* of \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w* all her \w desire|strong="H2656"\w*, whatsoever she \w asked|strong="H7592"\w*, beside \add that\add* which \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* her of his \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w bounty|strong="H3027"\w*. So she \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to her own \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, she and her \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.\f + \fr 10.13 \ft of his…: Heb. according to the hand of king Solomon\f*

¶ Now the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* was \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*,

Beside \add that he had\add* of the \w merchantmen|strong="H0582"\w*, and of the \w traffick|strong="H4536"\w* of the spice \w merchants|strong="H7402"\w*, and of all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Arabia|strong="H6153"\w*, and of the \w governors|strong="H6346"\w* of the \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 10.15 \ft governors: or, captains\f*

¶ And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w targets|strong="H6793"\w* \add of\add* \w beaten|strong="H7820"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add shekels\add* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* to \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w target|strong="H6793"\w*.

And \add he made\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w shields|strong="H4043"\w* \add of\add* \w beaten|strong="H7820"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*; \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w pound|strong="H4488"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* to \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*: and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.

¶ Moreover the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w ivory|strong="H8127"\w*, and \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* it with the \w best|strong="H6338"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

The \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* had \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*, and the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \add was\add* \w round|strong="H5696"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w*: and \add there were\add* \w stays|strong="H3027"\w* on either side on the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of the \w seat|strong="H7675"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w lions|strong="H0738"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w beside|strong="H0681"\w* the \w stays|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 10.19 \ft behind: Heb. on the hinder part thereof\f*\f + \fr 10.19 \ft stays: Heb. hands\f*

And \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w lions|strong="H0738"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* there on the one side and on the other upon the \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*: there was not the \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* in any \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*.\f + \fr 10.20 \ft the like: Heb. so\f*

¶ And all \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w drinking|strong="H4945"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \add were of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* \add were of\add* \w pure|strong="H5462"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*; none \add were of\add* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*: it was \w nothing|strong="H3972"\w* \w accounted|strong="H2803"\w* of in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.\f + \fr 10.21 \ft none…: or, there was no silver in them\f*

For the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* had at \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* a \w navy|strong="H0590"\w* of \w Tharshish|strong="H8659"\w* with the \w navy|strong="H0590"\w* of \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w*: \w once|strong="H0259"\w* in \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* the \w navy|strong="H0590"\w* of \w Tharshish|strong="H8659"\w*, \w bringing|strong="H5375"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w ivory|strong="H8143"\w*, and \w apes|strong="H6971"\w*, and \w peacocks|strong="H8500"\w*.\f + \fr 10.22 \ft ivory: or, elephants’ teeth\f*

So \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w exceeded|strong="H1431"\w* all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* for \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* and for \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.

¶ And all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* his \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, which \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w put|strong="H5414"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 10.24 \ft sought to: Heb. sought the face of\f*

And they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w present|strong="H4503"\w*, \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w garments|strong="H8008"\w*, and \w armour|strong="H5402"\w*, and \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, and \w mules|strong="H6505"\w*, a \w rate|strong="H1697"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* by \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.

¶ And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* and \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*: and he had a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, whom he \w bestowed|strong="H5148"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* for \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and with the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \add to be\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* as \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* he \add to be\add* as the sycomore \w trees|strong="H8256"\w* that \add are\add* in the \w vale|strong="H8219"\w*, for \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*.\f + \fr 10.27 \ft made: Heb. gave\f*

¶ And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w brought|strong="H4161"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and linen \w yarn|strong="H4723"\w*: the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w merchants|strong="H5503"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* the linen \w yarn|strong="H4723"\w* at a \w price|strong="H4242"\w*.\f + \fr 10.28 \ft And Solomon…: Heb. And the going forth of the horses which was Solomon’s\f*

And a \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* for \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add shekels\add* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and an \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* for an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*: and so for all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and for the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, did they bring \add them\add* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* by their \w means|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 10.29 \ft by their…: Heb. by their hand\f*
